name: 蔡舜宏
objective: 本課程將介紹模糊邏輯、模糊推論、模糊控制及其應用。滑動模式控制、適應性控制、最佳控制、基因演算法及其相關智慧型控制方法之設計及應用也將在此課程中被探討。此外，藉由一些物理及工程的系統以驗證課程中所介紹之智慧型控制法方之可行性及有效性。
schedule:
week 1　　Introduction
week 2　　Binary logic and Fuzzy logic
week 3　　Fuzzy proposition and fuzzy inference
week 4　　Fuzzy control and its application
week 5　　Bang-bang control and sliding mode control
week 6　　Sliding mode control and its application
week 7　　Adaptive control and fuzzy sliding mode control (1)
week 8　　Adaptive control and fuzzy sliding mode control (2)
week 9　　Midterm examination
week 10　　Omni-directional mobile robots
week 11　　Chaotic system and Chua's circuit
week 12　　Optimal control
week 13　　Optimal control and its application
week 14　　Genetic Algorithm (1)
week 15　　Genetic Algorithm (2)
week 16　　Application for some physical and engineering systems
week 17　　Project Presentation
week 18　　Final examination
scorePolicy:
Quiz    (20%)
Midterm examination (20%)
Project Presentation (40%)
Attendance  (20%)
